Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>What? You want to take the class? Have
you asked Mr. Symin?
Talk_6015:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>My mom's a Cece fan, so she gets mad
if my clothes get dirty.<sp:0:4:0>Don't spread this around, but rain is
A-Zoom's one weakness.
Talk_6002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Call me A-Zoom while I'm on patrol!
I gotta keep a close eye out in case any
bad guys show their faces!
Talk_7006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I got so caught up in playing A-Zoom that
I lost track of time.<sp:0:4:0>I'm pretty worn out now. If you need
something, ask somebody else, OK?
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want to take the class, you should
talk to Mr. Symin.
Talk_6016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>So...can I get back to patrolling now?
Without A-Zoom on the job, the bad guys
might win!
Talk_7007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm pretty worn out now. If you need
something, ask somebody else, OK?<sp:0:4:0>I'm gonna go to sleep. Good night!
Talk_8000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That ancient hero getup you showed us
was so cool!<sp:0:4:0>Someday, I gotta come up with a special
costume for A-Zoom too.
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Morning, Mr. Link! Are you gonna teach
us today?
Talk_6004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The truth is, my identity as the general-
store owner's son is just a cover.
Talk_6017:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Did you know bad guys took over old man
Robbie's lab in northeast Akkala?<sp:0:4:0>There's also a <clr:0000>research lab <clr:ffff>at the top of
the hill here, but it's too far away for me
to patrol every day.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>What if the bad guys find out about
A-Zoom's blind spots and take it over?
You gotta keep my secret!
Talk_8001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The curry you gave us was really good.<sp:0:4:0>Maybe A-Zoom should have his own
special curry recipe. Whaddaya think?
Talk_6018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Um, let's see. It doesn't look like the bad
guys are interested in Ms. Zelda's house
on the edge of town.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Mom said Ms. Zelda might not ever come
back. But I still believe!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>A big reason A-Zoom keeps an eye on
things is so Ms. Zelda can come back
anytime she wants!
Talk_6006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Ummm, let's see... Teebo's house is the 
closest one, and I haven't seen any bad
guys there.<sp:0:4:0>Teebo's dad was the gatekeeper here,
but he went to help out at a place called
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>So now Teebo and his mom take turns
guarding the gate.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Oh, my mom was talking about Teebo's
mom though. What was it she said?<sp:0:4:0>Something like, "It's a real shame she's
not more interested in fashion!"
Talk_6019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm, let's see. <sp:5:1:0>One spot I've been
watching is old man Nack's field at
the town entrance.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Haven't seen any bad guys there so far!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>My mom says Nack is the most
fashionable farmer in the village.<sp:0:4:0>But he hangs out a lot with Reede, the
village mayor, and that guy doesn't care
about fashion at all. So I don't get it.
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, Professor, you're gonna be late for
school if you don't move it!
Talk_6007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm, let's see. Old lady Uma was fussing
over what to plant in the field...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>No bad guys spotted that way though!<sp:0:4:0>That old lady grows the best veggies in
Hateno Village, y'know.<sp:0:4:0>That's what my mom says, so it must
be true!
Talk_6020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm Azu! <sp:5:0:0>Well, sort of.<sp:0:4:0>My identity as the general-store owner's 
son is just a cover. I'm actually A-Zoom,
the big-time hero!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>Oh, but you can't tell the adults around
here. It's a secret! <sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I gotta go on patrol now. See ya!
Talk_6021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm really A-Zoom, the big-time hero!<sp:0:4:0>It's my job to protect the school and the
village from bad guys until Ms. Zelda
comes back!
Talk_7000:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL>Uh-oh! I got so caught up in playing
A-Zoom that I didn't notice it getting late!<sp:0:4:0>I gotta get home. If you need something,
you should ask a grown-up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>I'm gonna get an earful if I don't make it home
before Mom gets back to the store.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_6010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You need something, Mr. Link? I'm on
patrol right now as A-Zoom. Gotta keep
an eye out in case any bad guys show up!
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Sorry, but I get in trouble if I'm late.
If you need something, can you ask
a grown-up?
Talk_7002:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL>Mom's gonna be so mad if I don't make it
home before she gets back to the store.<sp:0:4:0>I don't have time to talk. If you need
something, you should ask a grown-up!
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>If I don't hurry, I'm gonna be soaked by
the time I get to school.<sp:0:4:0>If you need something, could you ask
a grown-up?
Talk_6012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Shh! <sp:5:0:0>I'm not Azu right now. Call me
A-Zoom when I'm on patrol!<sp:0:4:0>Got it? See ya!
Talk_7003:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I need to hurry, or I'll be soaked through
before I get home.<sp:0:4:0>My mom's a big-time Cece fan, and
she gets mad at me if she sees me in
dirty clothes.<sp:0:4:0>If you need something, ask somebody
else, OK?
Talk_6000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm Azu! Nice to meet ya!<sp:0:4:0>My identity as the general-store owner's 
son is just a cover. I'm actually A-Zoom,
the big-time hero!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>Oh, but you can't tell the adults around
here. It's a secret! <sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Kickin' bad-guy butts is way cooler when
nobody knows it's you!
Talk_6001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You need something? I'm on patrol right
now as A-Zoom. Gotta keep an eye out in
case any bad guys show up!
